snippet: Malaysia said it expelled North Korea's ambassador on Saturday for refusing to apologize for his strong accusations over Malaysia's handling of the investigation into the killing of the North Korean leader's half brother....

headline.main: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship
headline.print_headline: Senior China Government Adviser Criticizes Web Censorship

lead_paragraph: Malaysia said it expelled North Korea's ambassador on Saturday for refusing to apologize for his strong accusations over Malaysia's handling of the investigation into the killing of the North Korean leader's half brother.
